textcontent:
new daq in eco implemented

new daq is now called "daq" in eco, and it is the default counter in scans, if no counter specified it will be used.

The channel lists at the moment include everything, also the camera images. The weird bitshuffle compression is presently only used for the camera images. Escape dies not take that into account, you still need to "import bitshuffle.h5" , which can be done after already parsong the scan in escape though.

Pointing slit_switch

Pointed the slit to the center of slit switch (which is not in the center of the crosshairs).
